nodes.text: The Gold Order of Cularin was an award created and distributed by the Cularin government. After the Cularin Militia dispatched the Thaereian Military, the members of the militia were awarded to those members who fought in the battles, living and dead.

The award was symbolic of "the gratitude of the Cularin people and their commitment to honoring the heroes responsible for their freedom and their continued protection from the forces of evil and tyranny in the galaxy."
